alert.note: Alert for Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 11:03AM EDT until July 29 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Hazard affecting Perry County. North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Hazard. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs. The lower part of the business district is affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 27.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 27.4 feet on 10/17/1989. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 5 PM EDT.
